result.markdown:
--- title: "Model Settings Review" execute: warning: false df-print: kable echo: false --- :::{.callout-note} ## Model setting trough excel will lead to errors The excel files are well structured but may be error prone: - Many different excel files must be opened at the same time, - There are a lot of plain text repetition in the files, - There is no crossed data validation between excel files (I can launch a simulation on `Indvi3` instead of `Indiv3`, the source of the problem can be long to find). - Each user have its own Excel files in its environment. As they can be hard to "merge", reproducibility is hard to achieve, - Excel files are badly versionned, thus are lowering the simulations repeatability over time. ::: ::: {.cell} ::: ## Excel files ### Scenarios ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
|Scenario_name |IndividualId |ModelParameterSheets |ApplicationProtocol | SimulationTime|SimulationTimeUnit |SteadyState |ModelFile | |:-------------|:------------|:--------------------|:-------------------|--------------:|:------------------|:-----------|:--------------| |TestScenario |Indiv1 |Global |Aciclovir_iv_250mg | 24|h |FALSE |Aciclovir.pkml | |TestScenario2 |Indiv |Global |Aciclovir_iv_250mg | 12|h |TRUE |Aciclovir.pkml |
::: ::: ### ApplicationParameters ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
|Container Path |Parameter Name | Value|Units | |:---------------------------------------------------------------------------|:--------------|-----:|:-----| |Applications|IV 250mg 10min|Application_1|ProtocolSchemaItem |Dose | 250|mg |
::: ::: ### IndividualParameters ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
|Container Path |Parameter Name | Value|Units | |:--------------------|:--------------|-----:|:------| |Organism|Kidney |GFR | 90|ml/min |
::: ::: ### IndividualPhysiology ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
|IndividualId |Species |Population |Gender | Weight [kg]| Height [cm]| Age [year(s)]| |:------------|:-------|:------------------|:------|-----------:|-----------:|-------------:| |Indiv1 |Human |European_ICRP_2002 |MALE | 73| 176| 30|
::: ::: ### ModelParameters ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display}
|Container Path |Parameter Name | Value|Units | |:-------------------|:-----------------------|-----:|:-----| |Organism|Liver |EHC continuous fraction | 1|NA |

|PopulationName |species |population | numberOfIndividuals| proportionOfFemales|weightMin |weightMax |weightUnit |heightMin |heightMax |heightUnit | ageMin| ageMax|BMIMin |BMIMax |BMIUnit | |:--------------|:-------|:------------------|-------------------:|-------------------:|:---------|:---------|:----------|:---------|:---------|:----------|------:|------:|:------|:------|:-------| |TestPopulation |Human |European_ICRP_2002 | 1000| 0|NA |NA |kg |NA |NA |cm | 22| 41|NA |NA |kg/mÂ² |
